items.sentence: Tom didn't seem to know very much about Boston.
Make sure all the doors and windows are locked.
Watching the cat sleeping makes me feel better.
If you run into a problem, just give me a call.
Boxes shouldn't be transported completely full.
The police no longer believe Tom murdered Mary.
Tom really wanted to believe Mary was innocent.
It's hard to believe Tom could murder somebody.
I'm really looking forward to seeing your show.
Tom knew that he couldn't make everybody happy.
